mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume ( member_idx, resume_title, resume_create_at, resume_img, school_name, major, grade, degree, enroll_date, graduation_date ) VALUES ( #{member_idx}, #{resume_title}, NOW(), #{resume_img}, #{school_name}, #{major}, #{grade}, #{degree}, #{enroll_date}, #{graduation_date} )
INSERT INTO resume_exp_info( resume_idx, company_name, occupation, position, experience ) values( #{resume_idx}, #{company_name}, #{occupation}, #{position}, #{experience} )
mapper.update: UPDATE resume SET member_idx = #{member_idx}, resume_title = #{resume_title}, resume_create_at = #{resume_create_at}, resume_img = #{resume_img}, school_name = #{school_name}, major = #{major}, grade = #{grade}, degree = #{degree}, enroll_date = #{enroll_date}, graduation_date = #{graduation_date} WHERE resume_idx = #{resume_idx}
UPDATE resume_exp_info SET resume_idx = #{resume_idx}, company_name = #{company_name}, position = #{position}, experience = #{experience}, occupation = #{occupation} WHERE exp_idx = #{exp_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT resume_idx, company_name, occupation, position, experience FROM resume_exp_info WHERE resume_idx = #{resume_idx}
SELECT resume_idx, resume_title, resume_create_at FROM resume
SELECT answer_idx, question_idx, member_idx, answer_text, ai_feedback, answer_create_at FROM answer
